content.question: A. Describe the map scale shown in Image 1. B. Explain an economic reason why people adopted the land use practice shown in Image 2. C. Explain how irrigation may contribute to water resource depletion. D. Explain the degree to which mechanized irrigation may allow crops to be grown in locations with arid climates. E. Explain how government policies may reduce farmers’ economic risks associated with events such as severe weather or crop failure.
